do_not_understand.description: True if you do not understand the user's most recent response or if it doesn't fit into the other categories

rma.description: True if the user indicates they want to do an RMA, false otherwise

order_status.description: True if the user indicates they want to check order status, false otherwise

has_order_number.description: True if the user indicates that they have their order number, false otherwise

order_number.description: The order number provided by the user
